description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Program_HierarchyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Program_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Program_HierarchyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Program Hierarchy

Program_Hierarchy_Data.description: Program Hierarchy Reference ID.  This is the Program Hierarchy unique identifier.
Boolean flag which when set to true will include the Program Hierarchy ID in the Program Hierarchy Name.
Boolean Flag which when set to true Inactivates the Program Hierarchy.

Organization_SubtypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Organization_SubtypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Organization_SubtypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Program_Hierarchy_Data.description: Reference to an existing Organization Subtype valid for Program Hierarchies.

Program_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Program_HierarchyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Program_Hierarchy_Data.description: Reference to an existing Program Hierarchy to add as the superior.

ProgramObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

ProgramObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

ProgramObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Program_Hierarchy_Data.description: Reference to existing Programs to add as the subordinates.

validation.validation: Programs cannot be used more than once in a single hierarchy. Please change the Parent or modify the Programs to Include. (Programs: [program])
Parent Program Hierarchy is not valid because it is a descendent in the existing hierarchy. Please remove the parent hierarchy or select a new one.
This Program Hierarchy cannot be inactivated because it has active subordinates.
An inactive Program Hierarchy cannot be assigned as the superior of a Program Hierarchy.
A hierarchy structure is defined on this organization. Please delete the hierarchy structure before assigning any superior organization.
A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the Organization Subtype for this hierarchy.
A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the parent hierarchy.
A top-level hierarchy structure exists and is enforced for this parent hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level hierarchy structure first before selecting this as a parent hierarchy.
